description: Allows the management account or delegated administrator to perform privileged tasks on member accounts in your organization. For more information, see Centrally manage root access for member accounts in the Identity and Access Management User Guide. Before you enable this feature, you must have an account configured with the following settings:

nested_items.name: OrganizationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of an organization.

nested_items.name: EnabledFeatures
nested_items.description: The features you have enabled for centralized root access.
